channel.title: :confused:
channel.description:
[15:46:38] and seriously frank_, if anything of the sort happens again, I won't be held back in pressing the ban button in your profile
discuss

item.title: :confused:
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:51, topic:247316”][quote author=io9 link=topic=326302.msg2563472#msg2563472 date=1228264682]
No, just Lothy gave him and frank_ the ability to do that.
[/quote]
To the contrary, it has always been done manually as far as I know. The only usergroup capable of changing their own avatar/title besides administrators is global moderators. I did talk to Niall at one stage about giving that same ability to senior moparscape moderators, but we canned it.[/quote]
Niall allowed me and frank_ to have control over our image and custom title.

Read full topic

item.title: :confused:
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:44, topic:247316”]Yz85Racer if people didn’t ‘hate’ you before, they are going to now if you keep bitching about it. The internets are not always fair but just deal with it.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 02, 2008, 03:00:38 pm[/size][hr][quote author=casey. link=topic=326302.msg2562966#msg2562966 date=1228249429]

I can understand removing my MSCP mod status, but did you have to remove my programming moderator?

He didn’t have any warning powers on that so why was that removed?
[/quote]

The admins probably felt that yz is not capable of making good judgement calls because of what he did. You need good judgement when moderating any part of the forum.

Of course we all know that if he was given a second chance then he most likely would not fuck up again. But, thats just the reality of it I guess. Doesn’t mean he should get a second chance.[/quote]
Of course I would not fuck up again, I know I probably will not receive a second chance, all I am asking is for a reason why I do not deserve one as I was moderator for 6 months and moderated a lot, I even wrote a base for MSCP so people had something to work with.

But, I don’t still understand why my programming moderator position was removed, Cowie` left that position and the programming boards were unmoderated and I talked to Niall and he said I could have it. I didn’t even make a mistake when it came to moderating that board, but it was removed?

Read full topic

item.title: :confused:
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:36, topic:247316”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=326302.msg2561931#msg2561931 date=1228183228]
I have demoted Yz85Racer to a regular member. The only reason he is not banned is because he admitted it and I didn’t have to go through the database to see who did it.

Needless to say, this same action will take place if this ever happens again, hopefully it won’t.
[/quote]
I seriously love how every other member would have gotten a warning, but since you don’t like me as it is. Funny, I could of sworn I had a part of the story to tell, but oh well. Lothy already issued me with a threatening of being demoted, and as far as I can recall, we agreed that I would be on probation.

Of course I admitted, I seriously had no shame in doing so. Tico135 doesn’t like me, even though he says he does. I don’t care if he doesn’t like me, but when he begins personally targeting my mentor, I am entitled to try and argue my case. I don’t mind being demoted, all I ask is that I am given a second chance. Silab was granted one, why am I any different?[/quote]

Where did you get the idea that I don’t like you? I don’t like what you did, but it ends there. About Silab, you are right, she was given a second chance, almost 2 years later…

Read full topic

item.title: :confused:
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Yz85Racer:

Of course I admitted, I seriously had no shame in doing so. Tico135 doesn’t like me, even though he says he does. I don’t care if he doesn’t like me, but when he begins personally targeting my mentor, I am entitled to try and argue my case. I don’t mind being demoted, all I ask is that I am given a second chance. Silab was granted one, why am I any different?

I like you, Yz85racer, however I was not very fond of your action. The reason frank_ was moderated was completely legit, and if you can not see that his post was clearly spam, you’re retarded (no offense). I had not personally targeted frank_ until hours after the moderation had already been removed, so that is simply not an excuse. I threatened frank_ with a ban a good 8-12 hours after I had originally moderated him. I have nothing against you Yz, but I will not stand and watch when a certain moderator removes a punishment for a friend when they clearly went overboard.

Read full topic

Of course I admitted, I seriously had no shame in doing so. Tico135 doesn’t like me, even though he says he does. item.title: :confused:
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:32, topic:247316”]Just so we’re all clear on this: the intention with the ban threatening was: if he was to post spam or take something way to far in the flaming department. I wasn’t simply threatening him for another staff member removing the punishment.[/quote]remember that time you have a tiny dick

it was a direct threat at me and noone else, stop talking shit

item.title: :confused:
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Moparisthebest:

and moderators that do things like that can be demoted (and perhaps banned)

Honestly a ban is taking it way too far. No need to lose a good member over that, we’re short of them as it is. It just seems stupid to ban someone for that, when you could spend that time banning an idiot such as pk4pk or runescape3dude.

Read full topic
